column4: I have a really odd problem.  My mouse pointer settings seem very inconsistent and I can't seem to change them to what I want.  For example, in Chromium the link hand pointer is from whiteglass but the regular pointer is from redglass.
So, in short, how do I go about configuring my mouse pointer to an installed theme?
pointer themes have been flakey for ages.. Not sure why its been so goofy. askubuntu.com may have some info on it.
